content: Maar apreminte bovuso

Kartthaave! Krpacheyyaname
Praarththhana nee kaikkollllaname
Nindayavum ninmochanavum
Ninnarayil ninnekaname.

Aadukalleprathi koorode
Paadukallettoru nallidayaa!
Santoshothsavamee nyangall
Kondaadaan krpacheyyaname.

Ellaattinnum naayakane!
Srshdikall thannarike varuvaan
Ninne prerippichenna
Ninte mahaakrpayaalippoll.

Heenarathaameedaasaril nee
Kaarunyam cheytheedaname
Ninne villikkum ninnadiyaar-
Kkeppozhum krpanalkaname.

Sodarare! Yaachippukalle
Kellkkukayillennorkkaruthe
Pashchaatthaapatthaal ninuvaa
Rakshitharaayu namukkarththhikkaam.

Nanmaykkullllorovighnam
Nammiltthanneyaakunnu
Thante mahaakaarunyatthe
Daivam thaan thadayunnilla.

Anveshippon kandetthum
Ennallo thiruvedamozhi
Evangelonil ninnum
Nannaayu naamarinyennathupol

Appam makkall yaachichaal
Appan kallekunnilla
Mathsyam makkall chodichaal
Paampineyum nalkaarilla.

Thanthirumumpil yaachikkum
Daasarude aavashyangall
Nalkeedum daivatthodaayu
Nammallkkum yaachicheedaam.

Thanne villipporkkaayu naathhan
Than vaathil thuranneedunnu.
Daaneeyelinnennathupol
Nyangade yaachanakallkkaayi.

Ninvaathil thuranneedaname
Ninneyavan kuzhiyilninnum
Kenuvillicharththhichappoll
Maalaakhaye vittallo.

Aattinkoottangallkkidayan
Aadyanathaayu nilkkumpole
Nyangade yaachanakallkkippoll
Sleebaaye mun nirtthunnu.

Kartthaave nyangallkkippoll
Nalkarutheyaashaabhamgam
Eeyadiyaarude yaachanaye
Niyanpaal kaikkollllaname

Garbhaniye vidhikartthaakkall
Kollaanelppikkaatthathupol
Ninmeyu rakthangall perum
Bhoomiye nee shikshikkaruthe.

Maanassuvaattam kannirum
Vannidenam praarththhanayil
Punchiriyulllladharam vyasanam
Thattaatthamanavum poraa.

Vrddhanmaar pizhacheytheedil
Unnikall thanvilli kellkkaname.
Unnikall than namaskkaaratthaal
Rakshithamaayallo ninuva.

Muttivillipporkkaayu vaathil
Thurakkum naathhannaayu sthothram
Anuthaapam kaikkollvoril
Santoshikkum svargeeyar.

Nyangallude paapammoolam
Bhoomiye nee shikshikkaruthe
Kartthaave! Nee kaarunyam
Poondamahonnathanaanallo.

Sangkadamaayoristhhithiyil
Nyangalle neeyittekkaruthe
Ee nin kopatthinteyum
Shikshayudeyum kaalatthil.

Ninnadiyaarude nerenin
Vaathiladacheedalle nee
Nyangall paapikallaanennu
Ettuparanyeedunnayyo.

Ninkanivee daasanmaarkku
Nalkaname nallaashvaasam
Nyangalle nee shikshippathunal
Kaarunyatthodaakaname

Theenarakam thannilninnum
Nyangalle nee rakshikkaname.
Nyangade yaachanakallkkaayi
Nin vaathil thuranneedaname.

Nin daasanmaarullkkonda
Nin thirurakthashareerangall
Nyangallude deshatthinte
Rakshaykkaayuthakeedaname.

Ninnaattinkoottatthinnu
Ninsleebaa munnilkkaname
Anpudayonaam nallidayaa!
Sangkadashabdam kellkkaname.

Ninmumpil karayunnoraam
Nyangade kuttam pokkaname
Hannaaykkanpaal santaanam
Daanam cheythallo naathhaa!

Ninsabhayin yaachanakall nee
Nalkaname krpayodippoll
Thanprajakallthan koottatthaal
Shobhippikkanameyathine.

Naathhaa ninthrkkaiyaale
Ninsabhaye vaazhttheedaname
Sarvvajanangallilum ninte
Vaazh/u200bvukalle varshippikka.

Maartthommaashleehaa thante
Praarththhanayaal nirappaakaname.
Shikshakallum duഃkhangallume
Nee krpayodozhivaakkaname.

Ninnodu yaachippaan naathhaa!
Yogyathayillaathullllavaraam
Ee dushdanmaarodippoll
Kaarunyam thonneedaname.

Mochanamekeedunnathinu
Yaachana cheytheedunnavaraam
Ee durnneethikkaar thannil
Preethiyudippicheedaname.

Nyangallkkekeedaanaayu nee
Thayyaarennarullundallo
Aaraanyum kitteedaaykil
Nyangallthaan lajikkendaar.

Ekunnon kaineettunnu
Vaangendon pinmaarunnu
Dushdanmaarum muttichaal
Nee kellkkunnallo krpayaal.

Aayathinaalaavashyakkaa-
Raayore! Ningall vannu
Aishvaryam nirayum thante
Bhandaarappurayilninnum

Ningalludeyaavashyangall
Sarvvavume nedikkollvin
Idavillaatharullunnonil
Ninnihaningade yaachanakall

Yaathonnum vilanalkaathe
Daanamathaayu kokkondiduvin
Nyangalle nirmmichennene!
Nyangallude vedanayortthu

Angeykkallaathullllatthil
Sangkadamingaarkkundaakum?
Eeyadiyaarude dushdavrnam
Neeyallaathaar pokkeedum.

Maathaavin maarvvinnoppam
Mattevide sukhamunnikku
Unnikkulllloraahaaram
Maathaavin mulayil ninnaam.

Naathhaa! Nintirusannidhiyil
Nanmakallunde dhaaraallam
Ororothunayeppozhum
Ninnilninnozhukeedunnu.

Naathhaa! Nin nikshepangall
Muttullllorkkarulleedaname
Bhoomiyumaakaasham thaanum
Naashamathaayu theerunnengkil.

Ninnude pallllikalle nannaayu
Shobhippicheedunnathinum
Ninmeyu rakthangall pooji
Kkunnathinum kazhivundaamo.

Naathhaa! Nyangallithaa ninte
Bhandaarappurayil pooki
Krpayullllone! Nyangallkkaayu
Ninvaathilthuranneedaname.

Ninte pithaavingkalninnum
Mochanavum krpayum varane
Kaarunyam kondaallaathi-
Nnengane rakshapedum nyangall

Vaathilkalleyippoll ningall
Vegamuyartthiduvin thalakall
Maanyathayerum raajanthan
Bhandaarappura pookatte

Nyangallkkaayu krpayum dayavum
Mochanavum nalkeedatte
Anpudayonaam nallidayaa!
Nyangade yaachana kellkkaname.

Ninmumpil karayunnadiyaar
Nyangade kuttam maaykkaname
Sangkadamanpodekeetti
Nnuttharamarullicheyyaname.

Kaivediyaathadiyangalle nee
Kaatthusadaa paaliykkaname
Ippozhumellaa neratthum
Ennekkum rakshikkaname.

Praarththhanaye kellkkunnavane
Yaachanaye nalkunnavane!
Praarththhanaketteedaasarude
Yaachanaye nalkeedaname.
Maar apreminte memraa
(anuthaapatthinte)

Aathmaave! Entinu neeyi-
Nnenniyerinyeedunnithupol
Entinu nee chovvillaattha
Vazhiyilkkoodi nadakkunnu.

Neeyinnentinu vanchanayil
Idarippokunnaathmaave!
Nee pintiriyunnillallo
Athinaal ninakkayyo kashdam.

Lokavumathilullllavayellaam
Svapnam polaam vidhinaallo
Alariyananyidumennarika
Ayyo nee vidhipedumannaall.

Kazhiyum polaathmaave! Nee
Vilapichattahasichiduka
Ninnanyaayangallkkaayi
Karayuka karayuka neeyettam.

Parichayamullllavarum ninne
Parichilarinyeedaatthavarum
Ellaavarume ninnodo-
Tthayyo paaram vilapikkum.

Than paapamarinyaadaavee-
Diravum pakalum kanneeraal
Thante kidakka nanachayyo
Ayyo valuthaam ninduritham.

Aazhamkoodiya kuzhi nee theer-
Tthannyaayamathaam virakaale
Nee katthichulllloragni
Ayyo ninne nokkunnu.

Ethrayumugram nyaayavidhi
Vidhikartthaavathi bheekaranaam
Aa samayam thannilninne
Ayyo kaappaanaarundaam.

Paazhumashuddhavumaayavayaal
Ninnudekaalam nee pokki
Annezhunnallllatthanayumpo-
Llayyo neeyevideppokum.

Ninkaikondu pirichoraa-
Kayaraal kettappedume nee
Nee theertthu ninakkaalaatthum
Ayyo ninneyazhippaanaar.

Ethrayo nannu marichengkil
Athilum nannu janikkaaykil
Nee uyirorkkathi nindayathaayu
Nee mrtharil mumpanumaay.

Ninneyutthama Daivam than
Roopamathennu villichallo
Utthamaputhran than lokam
Ninakkaayu vaagdaanavumeki.

Avarude naallanayunneram
Neeyevideppoyu marayunnu
Yaachana nee cheytheedumpo-
Llayyo ninakku mahaakashdam.

Kapadathayullllaathmaave! Nee
Palakuri shapathham cheythallo
Vanchayullllaathmaave! Nee
Pollivaakkanavadhi chonnallo.

Paapam vittupirinyeedaan
Nishchayavum cheythennaalum
Durmmaargatthe veruttheedaan
Nanmanamilla ninakkethum.

Evideppoyidumaathmaave!
Neeyentavide cheytheedum?
Pettannaanaallanayumpo-
Llayyo neeyevideppokum.

Uyaravumaazhavumannillakum
uzhalum vaanavar maanavarum
Paarakall polliyum neram nee
Ayyo entavide cheyyum.

Irull ninne pidikoodumpoll
Vettamkaattaanaarund?
Eritheeyil neeyeriyumpo-
Llayyo panineer veeshaanaar?

Ellaapaapatthekkaallum
Vallaatthavayaam ninpaapam
Azhukum vrnamokkekkaallum
Naarunnavayaam ninte vrnam.

Ayyo ninnude murivukalli
Nnellaa murivukallekkaallum
Aapalkkaramaanu ninakki-
Ngayyo aarusukham nalkum.

Peeshonpole thuranniduka
Nin kannukallennaathmaave!
Geehonpole thurannaalum
Vegam ninkanmanikalleyum.

Avayodukoode deklaasum
Praasum koodi chernnaalum
Ninnekkazhuki vedippaakkaa-
Nayyomathiyaavukayilla.

Ninnadharam vilapikkatte
Ninhrdayam duഃkhikkatte
Ninmukhavum vaadeedatte
Ayyo ninpizha valuthallo.

Ninte kazhutthukunichiduka
Chaaram bhakshyavumaakkiduka
Maranaavasthha niroopichi-
Ngayyo karayuka nee paaram.

Karayaan vashamullllavaraaya
Naarikalle varuttheeduka nee
maranam poondaninakkaayi-
Ttayyo avarum karayatte.

Ullllil krpayillaatthavane!
Ninnodaaroru krpacheyyum
Vidhikartthaavum vediyumpo-
Llayyo ninte thunaykkaaru

Melilninnaakaashamaho
Ninnetthallllimarichidum
Bhoomiyathinmadiyiltthanne
Ninneyadakkiyamartthidum.

Dhanavaanodotthorumichu
Murayiduvaanaayu thuniyum nee
Ninmuravilliyathu kettidaa-
Nayyo aarundaayidum.

Naazhikathorum nee thorum
Naazhikathorum nee pizhakkum
Ninnupavaasam praarththhanayum
Nyaayamathengane kaikkollllum.

Nee ninnaadamuyartthiyaho
Avanecholli villicheedum
Mattullllavar thankuttatthe
Onnozhiyaathe vellivaakkum

Ennaalaarude yaachanayaa-
Nanneratthakhilaadheeshan
Thaan kaikkondeeduvathennum
Ayyo niroopicheeduka nee

Durithappettoraathmaave!
Thaathasuthaashvaasapradane
Sthothram cheyyukaneeyennaa-
Lethragunangall ninakkundaam.
Maar apreminte memraa

Kartthaave! Karayillaattha
Hrdayamenikkarulleedaname
Pizhayadhikaaram cheythathinaal
Munnekkaallathuvashallaayi.

Kartthaave! En praarththhanayaal
Susthhiravum shuddhiyumulllla
Ninnaathmaavineyennullllil
Nannaayonnu puthukkaname.

Aa ninnaathmaavennullllil
Divasamprathi paarttheedaname
Maunam deekshikkaathe samaa-
Dhaanatthodathuvaazhaname.

Enpaapatthin bahulathayaal
Roohaavazhinyaan praapicha
Munvaagdatthamakattiyathin
Nalvaramillaatthavanaayu nyaan

Krpayullllone! Roohaaye!
Veendum puthuthaakkanamennil
Athuninhithamennekkaani-
Chamalamanassil paarkkaname.

Kartthaave! Duchchhintakallum
Paapavikaarangallumatta
Kallavillaatthoru nirmmalamaam
Chitthamenikkekeedaname.

Kartthaave! Vanchathivukallum
Kudilathathantramathokkeyume
Nithyamakattum nirmmalamaam
Chitthamenikkekeedaname.

Naathhaa! Kopamadukkaathe
Vairamadutthavanodennum
Undaakaatthoru nirmmalamaam
Chitthamenikkekeedaname.

Aathmashareerangalle naasham
Cheyyumasooyaadoshamathum
Vaashiyumattoru nirmmalamaam
Chitthamenikkekeedaname.

Akamechathivaalochippaa-
Nanyane dushicholleedaanum
Thuniyaathulllloru nirmmalamaam
Chitthamenikkekeedaname.

Kartthaave! Ningunakaaryam
Chintikkaan thuniyaathonnaayu
Akramavrtthikallillaattha
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Kartthaave! Malinathayil ni-
Nnozhiyunnathumeelokatthin
Impangalle vediyunnathumaam
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Kaamavikaaramashuddhathayum
Sukhabhogavumeevakayonnum
Niroopikkaatheyirikkunna
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Kartthaave! Ee lokatthil
Sampatthivishesham sakalam
Echilupolenneedunna
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Kartthaave! Gavyaagrahavum
Mathiyillaaymayumattu sadaa
Akramanamokke verukkunna
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Kartthaave! Unnathabhaavam
Thannatthaane nadikkaattha
Nigallamasheshamakattunna
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Unnathasimhaasanamellaam
Nissaaramathennorkkunna
Adhikaarabhramamillaattha
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Bahumaanapriyamattathumaayu
Apamaanatthe sahippathumaayu
Keertthiyiluyaraatthathumaaya
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Kartthaave! Durmathsaramee-
Ngesheedaatthathumeppozhum
Thinmayil shangkakalarnnathumaam
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Anyaayatthil ninnente
Kaikall viramicheedatte
Salkkarmmangallkkaayavakall
Neettappedumaaraakatte.

Enkaalukall durmmaargatthil
Vaykkunnathinidayaakaruthe
Sanmaargatthilkkoodi sadaa
Nyaanadiyunninadakkaname.

Ninneyaaraayunnathumaayu
Ninvachanamkaakkunnathumaayu
Paapaminicheyyaatthathumaam
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Nerum nallathumaam chollil
Thaalparyam kalarunnathumaayu
Vinchintayakannathumaaya
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Durvaartthakallum vyarththhatharam
Pazhamozhiyumupekshikkuvathaayu
Ninsaakshyatthin rasamiyalum
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Kartthaave! Nin kalpanayil
Ninnanuvumthetteedaathe
Ninnetthiravaan priyamiyalum
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Ninnaajnyaamaargam thannil
Kaaladikall urappichiduvaan
Nirddeshicheedunnoru nal
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Kartthaave! Thiruvedatthil
Raapakal dhyaanatthodum nin
Sthuthiyaal thellivodumirikkum
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Anuthaapatthodu koodimahaa
Muravilli neduveerppukallaale
Pullinuthulyam vaadunna
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Kartthaave! Paapangalleyor-
Tthundaakum muravilliyaale
Mezhukennathupolurukeedum
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Sachintakall, sadvachanangall,
Nanmakallennivayoronnum
Eppazhumundaayeedunna
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Durnneethikall dushchintakalle
Nnellaavaka thinmakalleyum
Ethrayumakalatthaakkunna
Nirmmalachittham nalkaname.

Anpudayoneyathupolu-
Llllaashayamennil neethannu
Paapamakannum ninchercha
Nyaan nedukilettam nann.

Nararil priyamullllavane! Nee
Manamithupolennil chertthu
Athil nannaayu ninnodulllla
Bhayabhakthiyurappikkaname.

Naathhaa! Ithupol nirmmalamaam
Chitthamenikkarulleedaname
Ennil sthhiravum chovvumezhum
Roohaaye puthuthaakkaname.

Ninte vishuddhaathmaavine nee
Ente manassilirutthaname
Athilninnu duraathmaakkalle nee
Neerattedatthaakkaname.

Maamoodeesaayude vellllam
Ennil sthhithi cheyyunnayyo
Kartthaave! Dushdaathmaakkall-
Kkennilirippidamekaruthe.

Ennude jeevan kaatthidumen
Naathhaa! Ninakkennum sthothram
Ninkrpayirulokatthilumee
Ennilumundaayeedatte.
Maar apreminte memraa
(Anuthaapatthinte)

Ennudayone! Neeyenne
Kanmanipol kaattheedaname
Ninchirakaale marachuparee
Kshayil ninnenne kaakkaname.

Ollivaayu nokkeedaathente
Kannukalle nee kaakkaname
Vanchanakellkkaathadiyante
Kaathukalleyum kaakkaname.

Ennadharangallkkennum nee
Kaavalathaayum nilkkaname
Ennullallil dosham chey/u200bvaa-
Nulllla vichaaramudikkaruthe.

Kartthaave! Nallavivekam
Varddhippikkanamennil nee
Saurabhyatthaal ninneyeni
Kkimpappedutthaanida varane.

Aihika nettutthinupakaram
Ninne sampaadippaanum
Ninne snehachee lokam
Nirasippaanum krpacheyka.

Ennetthanne sannidhiyil
Kaazhchayanappaanum naathhaa!
Enne ninakku sugandhamathaayu
Arppippaanum krpacheyka.

Ennaathhaa! Nin thirumumpil
Aathmashareeramanassukalle
Shobhakalarnna villakkukallaayu
Nyaan katthippaaraakaname.

Aathmashareera manassukallaa-
Mennude thirumul kaazhchakalle
Thaathasuthaashvaasapradane!
Anpodu kaikkondeedaname.

Svargasthha pithaave! Ennil
Maanasa shuddhivarutthaname
Daivasuthaa! Neeyennaathmaa-
Vinu vishuddhi varutthaname.

Aashvaasapradanaakunna
Parishuddhaathmaave! Ente
Dehamashesham krpayaale
Paripaavanamaakkeedaname.

Antyadinatthil naathhaa! Nee
Santoshippikkanamenne
Aathmashareeramanassukall nin
Sthuthipaadunnu kaniyaname.
Maar apreminte memraa
(anuthaapatthinte)

Kartthaave! Nintiruvadiye!
Sthothram cheyyunnu daasan
Oruneravumillavillaathe
Thirunaamasthuthi paadunnen.

Paapam mochikkappeduvaan
Karayunnayyo nindaasan
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Paapakkadalil veenadiyaan
Shvaasam mutti vashamkettu
Durnnayamaakunnaazhatthil
Mungiyadikkadi thaazhunnen.

Nyaanezhunnelppaan thrkkai nee
Neettitthanneedanamippoll
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Enne valappaan vendiyithaa
Dushdan thannude valavachu
Kashdamavanthan thantratthaal
Thattiyedutthenneyippoll.

Enneyavan peedippikkaa-
Thennudayone! Kaakkaname
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Kartthaave! Nindaasakanaa-
Menne theenarakam thannil
Ittuporippaan vendiyavan
Yuddham cheyyunneppozhum.

Aayathinidayaakaathudane
Nee avane virodhikkaname
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Laukikachintayilayyo nyaan
Pettuvashamkettalayunnu
Upavaasam namaskkaarangall
Vittukallanyu samastham nyaan.

Nithyaanandam praapippaa
Nenne yogyanathaakkaname
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Ayyo kashdamenikkente
Samayavumellaam poyallo
En paapangall bhoomiyile
Podiyekkaallanavadhiyathre.

Enkuttangallashesham nin
Kanivaal mochicheedaname
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Rahasyangallarinyeedaan nee
Kazhiyunnavanaanathukondu
Nintiru sannidhithannileni-
Kkanavaanundu bhayam paaram.

Naathhaa! Neeyaadivasatthil
Mukhashobhayenikkekaname
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Nin mumpilumaasvargatthin
Nereyumadiyaan pizhacheythu
Ninparamaanandatthinu nyaan
Yogyathayillaatthavanallo.

Nintirukrpaye praapippaan
Enne yogyanathaakkaname
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Ninnuyirin meshayilninnum
Ninnadiyaan bhakshichudane
Purajaathikallodidapettu
Karapoondettavumudayone!

Krpayaalenneyodukkatthe
Koolikkaarodu cherkkaname
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

En naallukallettavumadhikam
Paazhaayittu kazhinyallo
Enchintakallellaamortthaa-
Lethrayashuddhappettavayaam.

Nee thellivulllla mukhatthodi-
Nnivane thrkkan paarkkaname
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

En paapamasheshavumente
Kanninu mumpilirikkunnu.
Ninne villikkumpozhenno-
Duttharamarulli cheyyaname.

Valabhaage thoongiyakalllla-
Ennoppam karuthanameyenne
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Ninnudenere nokkeedaa-
Niddaasakanille dhairyam
Ninne paaram kopippi
Chathinaalenikkayyo kashdam.

Ninnadiyaanoruneratthum
Vanneedaruthaashaabhamgam
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Naariyirikkunnorente
Paapavrnangallashesham nee
Ninkarunakkadalil kazhuki
Nannaayu sukhamaakkeedaname.

Ninnaaladiyaan sannidhiyil
Vediyappettavanaakaruthe
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Agni mahaakopatthode
Narakam thannil kaallunnu
Ennereyathu vallaathe
Garjikkunnayyo kashdam.

Kartthaave! Nin krpayathil ni-
Nnenne rakshicheedaname
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Innortthaalenneppole
Naariyavan bhoomiyililla
Mrgajaathikallil polumaho
Ennodu samamaayillonnum.

Orkkaname maamoodeesaa
Kaikkondavanaanallo nyaan
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Ennude chintakalleppozhum
Paapangallilaakunnathinaal
Enthalayil podimannippoll
Vaariyidendiyirikkunnu.

Orkkaname nintirugaathram
Bhakshichavanaanallo nyaan
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Ennude chintakalleppozhum
Paapangallilaakunnathinaal
Enthalayil podimannippoll
Vaariyidendiyirikkunnu.

Orkkaname nintirugaathram
Bhakshichavanaanallo nyaan
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Enpaapangalle varnnippaan
Illoru naavinu chaathuryam
Enkuttangalleyenneedaan
Praapthiyumilloru naavinnum.

Ninuvaayilundaayathupole
Kanivennilumundaakaname
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Eriyachintaabhaaratthaal
Uzhalunnathukondeedaasan
Samayam thettikkaathe nin
Sannidhiyil praarththhichilla.

Ellimayezhunnoreeyente
Praarththhanaye kaikkollllaname
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Raathriyil nyaan nintiruvadiye
Sthothram chey/u200bvaanezhunnettu
Paapachumadaalennaathmaa-
Vaaneratthu thallarnnadhikam.

Ennaathmaavin ksheenatthe
Ennaathhaa! Nee neekkaname
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Katthiyerinyu thillacheedu
Nnagnikkadalineyortthayyo
ee nin daasakanullllatthil
Ethra paribhramamerunnu.

Ninnarike nyaan vannanayaa-
Nennodu krpa nee cheyyaname.
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil..

Vrkshangall thannilakallude
Ennamathoppichennekkum
Ennudayone! Nin mumpil
Sthuthiyuyaraanidayaakatte.

Ninmaathaavin praarththhanayaal
Ennil krpa thonneedaname.
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil.

Nidrapedaatheyirikkunno
Runarvullllavane! Sthuthi nithyam
Naathhaa! Nibiyanmaarum nin
Shleehanmaarumanaykkunna

Praarththhanayaaliddaasakano-
Dullllalivundaayeedaname.
Kanyakamariyaamin makane!
Karuna chorinyeedanamennil

Kartthaaven paapam pokki
Mukthiyenikkarullunnathinaayu
Ningallumente sahodarare!
Snehatthodarththhichiduvin.T
